data.text: @yashoazad India needs a lot more philanthropists ..with a big heart...as also organ donors to make many lives worth living....GOI is not doing enough to motivate.

@yashoazad Sir I feel that every person who gets a better job with salary enough that she/he gets to marry must adopt a child..or at least finance her/his education till graduate..apart from their own biological child, lot can be done then like above IAS sir has done..
